short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirect IMDb film pages to their corresponding Letterboxd pages and vice versa.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This simple extension will navigate from active IMDb pages to its Letterboxd counter part and vice versa. This will also work from Letterboxd reviews for a film.
